text: George Byrd (born March 22, 1926 in Anson County, North Carolina, United States; died March 12, 2010 in Munich, Germany) was an American conductor. During the 1980s he performed mainly in Germany. George Byrd Category:American conductors (music) Category:American male conductors (music) Category:1926 births Category:2010 deaths
title: George Byrd
